nodes.bodyText: Maybe moving .containsOnlyOnce() to the next line and removing String concatenation will make more sense
Looks like this test and the above one are pretty similar. Will be nice if you can replace it with one parametrised.
this empty line seems to be odd
I was just wondering, Maybe it will be still useful to report empty list to say that files weren't resolved. Wdyt?
